text: Hugh wasn't impressed with this ingratiating barman whom Roddy had raked up. He was seedy and middle-aged with small black eyes set close together beneath heavily marked brows and a sly, crafty expression that failed to inspire confidence.'He was hitting the bottle pretty hard, sir... the man said in a loud whisper. 'Meaning no offence', he added, looking at Hugh.
